PLOT:
-----------
The true story of sisters who brought down a corrupt government becomes this made-for-TV political drama. Selma Hayek stars as Minerva Mirabal, a privileged woman growing up in the Dominican Republic. Minerva is sheltered and naÃƒÂ¯ve until she meets Lio Morales (Marc Anthony), a student rebel who educates her about the abuses of corrupt dictator Rafael Leonidas Trujillo (Edward James Olmos). After Lio is forced into exile, Minerva enrolls in college as her country's first female law student, while she and two of her three sisters become outspoken critics of Trujillo, despite the fact that her beauty has captured the national leader's attention. The sisters become known as "Las Mariposas," "The Butterflies," but their fame and outspoken activism cause both triumph and tragedy. Lumi Cavazos, Pilar Padilla and Mia Maestro costar. In the Time of the Butterflies (2001) is based on the book of the same name by Julia Alvarez.
